title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 397.9 - Authorization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 397.9 - Authorization

State Regulations
A State-prescribed form shall be marked "EAA" to identify
it as emergency assistance to adults. Such authorization shall not exceed the
amount permitted by this Part and shall only be for and in the amount necessary
to meet the specific emergency for which the application was
made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
397.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
